attributes.action: abolish the Daylight Saving Time (DST) clock change.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It supposedly saves energy BUT this has never been proven. What it does create is more disharmony with our natural rhythms. Those rhythms connect us to the world instead of separate us from it. If this planet is going to have a sustainable future, then honoring our natural rhythms is extremely important in that shift.
